text: The Congress of Tucum치n was a meeting in San Miguel de Tucum치n where people from what is now Argentina, Uruguay, and part of Bolivia declared Independence from the Spanish Empire on 9 July 1816. ==References== *Ministry of Education: Congress of Tucum치n (in Spanish) Category:19th century in South America Category:19th century in Spain Category:1816
